title: Critical n8n Vulnerability (CVSS 10.0) Allows Unauthenticated Attackers to Take Full Control
description: Cybersecurity researchers have disclosed details of yet another maximum-severity security flaw in n8n, a popular workflow automation platform, that allows an unauthenticated remote attacker to gain complete control over susceptible instances.
